column5: After the sunfire ''clearing a path'' for me .  i decide to take advantage of the new ''trail'' and go fishing in the remote lakes.  first day i went with my dad.  NOTHING NADDA ZILTCH KAPOOTE NONE NEGATIVE!!!  tried 2 lakes and nothing.....  the same night paul (whitespinnerbait) calls me and he is   about the brute he got in the lake right beside the ones we tried.  WELL LADDY DA!  day 2 .  start of the day  with a shower.     Then back to specks.  run through the beaten paths hoping not to get a flat tire from broken shards of glass.  portage to the lake . and there it is . speckled trout heaven.  :worthy:         these trout are feeding on leeches , minnows, flies, rock worms............ i mean everything!   Pure Sings of Health!
Man that's a beautiful fish Kevin! Congrats and thanks for showing it. Wow!
Bazinga!!!  Awesome
This is from the same lake the day before:   You should have been there bud!!!  Craig
Ya didn't happen to stumble upon a rear Sunfire Bumper along the way did ya ??
Great lookin specks boys! Good thing for uncle Pauly, ay Kev....lol
Thanks for sharing fishing 24/7 great pics I'm hoping the ice goes out soon up here too so I can get out!

I'd love to see some area lakes on the Ontario side of the Ottawa closed to ice fishing.  Just to get some better spring opps.  Nice speckles doods.  Familiar faces in this one.  What's the verdict on things Craig?
run through the beaten paths hoping not to get a flat tire from broken shards of glass.  Looolol nice specks
Awesome fish - both Kevin's and Craig's... and with the Sunfire in the report, good to see the Amigos rockin it still.
The F-H verdict?????
I'd say the F-H verdict is .........Bobber is probably on another 6 month VACATION
F-H Verdict...?  No clue. Totally in the dark on this one. Multi messages unreplied. Your guess should be just as good as or better than mine.  Craig
Great lookin' reds boys, keep 'em comin'.
Heck of a fish, well done!
Awesome fish guys !!!! Wow... Great way to welcome spring !!!!!

Nice fish guys. Craig I ran into RJ yesterday and it seems that everything was lost from the site. He was going to chat with Bobber again this week to see about getting the site up again but he didn't seem very optimistic. There was some talk of FatLuke maybe getting involved as he is a web guy but we'll have to wait and see. Cheers
very nice ...  beauty specks for sure
Great fishin Ace!  Time for the Sunfire to meet the Press.  I've posted a bit on the other thread about FH.  RJ
Those fish are amazing. TFS
I don't even dream of trout that big!!
Well, well, well......... look what the cat dragged in.
Nice fish
The fish is nice Kevin but I prefer the shower.
